GO:0005764 "lysosome"
get_subontology_from, tp_easyjoin_tool, Removes comment lines at the head of the Uniprot Go database file.
Grep1, GO:0009986 "cell surface"
get_subontology_from, uniprot, GO:0043230 "extracellular organelle"
get_subontology_from, Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside in lysosomes.
Filter1, GO:0043230 "extracellular organelle"
term_id_vs_term_name, wolf_psort, GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
get_subontology_from, bg_uniq, filters out all proteins in the input protein list of interest that are annotated as "extracellular region" and "lysosome" and "plasma membrane" excluding "extracellular organelle" and "cytoplasmic side of plasma membrane"
comp1, GO:0005887 "integral component of plasma membrane"
term_id_vs_term_name, Extracts uniprot accessions from all proteins in the input list that are predicted by WolfPsort to be lysosomal and/or extracellular.
Convert characters1, tp_cut_tool, Filters all proteins that are predicted to reside extracellularly.
Filter1, GO:0005576 "extracellular region"
term_id_vs_term_name, GO:0005764 "lysosome"
